title.rendered: INTECH wins Data Archiving System enhancement & Event Management System development project for one of the largest power companies in Saudi Arabia

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]INTECH has won a project for the enhancement of data archiving systems and deployment of a central outage event management system for one of the largest power companies in Saudi Arabia.

The client wished to migrate the existing PI System covering all regional control centers and sites to the latest hardware along with the latest software versions as well as deploy a standalone central outage event management system at its HQ for reporting of trips by generation and transmission operators.

With its diversified multi-vendor expertise and successful history of past project completions, INTECH is the most trusted automation and digital solutions partner for the biggest companies operating in Saudi Arabia. Having more than 25 years of experience in the Kingdom and being the authorized and preferred system integration partner for OSI-PI technologies in the GCC region, INTECH was the integrator of choice for our client.

INTECH’s scope covers multiple sites across the Kingdom and includes four Regional Control Centers. The scope of services is as follows:

  • Upgrading existing OPC Gateways and ensuring integration with various SCADA and Energy Management Systems
  • Customized application for recording Generation and Transmission Outages and Trips
  • Displaying management analyses for tracking and closing maintenance work orders
  • Installation and Commissioning of Regional and Central Control Centers
  • Training for client personnel

About INTECH

INTECH Process Automation Inc. is an international Control Systems engineering and Systems Integration company delivering reliable automation solutions to the Oil & Gas sector since 1991. INTECH has done projects in 31 countries across 6 continents with regional offices in 13 countries, equipping it with 2000+ engineering man-years of experience. INTECH’s vendor-neutral approach and extensive experience help serve both regional and global customers with the highest standards of quality and reliability.

INTECH covers all traditional asset classes (upstream, midstream & downstream) as well as shale and buoy automation. Its wide range of solutions covers traditional control system automation as well as hydraulic (surface and sub-surface) control system automation and advanced software solutions for operations and asset management. Customers benefit from INTECH’s lump-sum turnkey solutions to save costs and increase plant productivity.

For more information, visit: www.intechww.com

About INTECH Digital Solutions

INTECH offers consultancy solutions (consultancy, algorithms, technology) targeting operations, production & maintenance to discover hidden efficiencies in plants’ operating envelope. Working together with the customers, INTECH helps get more out of people, processes, and technology. INTECH’s partners are directly involved with and influence the development of virtually all industry-recognized alarm management standards and other influential documents, including the ISA-18.2 standard, the API-RP-1167 recommended practice, and the EEMUA 191 guideline document.

For more information on INTECH Advanced Software Solutions, click here: https://www.intechww.com/digital/

How we are responding to COVID 19: We are ensuring that our services and business agreements are executed to the satisfaction of our clients and partners without exposing anyone to COVID 19. Our factories are operational with significant new safety measures. We have devised a global COVID 19 plan that covers international movement, precautions, behavioral changes, and contingency & emergency response options for all our business regions.

If you are an INTECH client and have not received information about our business continuity plans, please feel free to reach out to an INTECH account manager or project manager.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
